title: Cosmos.1980.Carl.Sagan.Complete.Series.CroBar
description:
Before Bill Nye the Science Guy, before Neil Degrasse Tyson, there was Cosmos. Not as flashy as Tyson's revival, but still an amazing show. A documentary that asked us to look at ourselves from the perspective of the cosmos. Carl Sagan takes us for a stellar ride through space and time as we contemplate the cosmos.

Sagan does an awesome job explaining the hard to grasp concepts of the cosmos without dumbing it down and talking to you like you're a child.
